signs_description: Help us put these Bitcoin Signs across America!
signs_choose_header: THANKS FOR HELPING US PUT THESE BITCOIN SIGNS ACROSS AMERICA!
signs_choose_c1: We are now completely out of signs! Our mission is to accelerate Bitcoin adoption through education.
signs_choose_c2: Lots of you helped by putting these free Bitcoin signs in public. All of our signs have QR codes that link to an educational page about
signs_choose_c4: Thanks to our amazing community, we reached thousands of people and helped them take their first steps down the Bitcoin rabbit hole.
signs_share_c1: Share a photo of your sign spot with us on Nostr and see where other people are putting their signs.
signs_instructions_1: Enter your mailing address and we'll send you a box of 10 Bitcoin signs in the mail!
signs_instructions_2: Address data is deleted after your free signs are shipped.
